posts.postText:
Offender name: L.
Offender's Steam ID:http://steamcommunity.com/id/rathit/
What the Offender did: He RDMs constantly, On July 8, he rdmed and made up excuses for it. Today, on July 9, he's rdming for no reason. Falsely accusing people for being traitor at the beginning of each round when nothing even happened yet. Finally, he's killing server regulars, disrespecting them, and making fun of them without reason.
Were there any admins on at the time?: No, but I informed punk about it.
Proof: No pics, should of taken some, but you can ask some of the server regulars.

Okay, i can say, He was RDMING ALOT, He was killing alot of people just because of their voice, he was about to be karmabanned twice but left and came back later, and also, he has changed his name a shitload the last two days.

If we can get his steam id next time he comes on we will certainly ban him.
Next time he comes on, open the console and type status, look for his steam id next to his name.
